newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spain's GDP to grow 3 pct in 1997 - Kiel Institute.
newsitem.headline: Spain's GDP to grow 3 pct in 1997 - Kiel Institute.

text.p: MADRID, Oct 25 (Rueter) - Spain's gross domestic product (GDP) will grow three percent in 1997, the Institute of Economic Studies said on Friday, citing the latest forecasts from the Kiel Institute.
The GDP for the European Union is forecast to grow 2.6 percent in 1997 compared with a 1.4 percent forecast for 1996.
